import React from "react" import { BookOpen, Clock } from "lucide-react" export function CourseProgressTracker({ courses }) { return (

Course Progress

{courses.map((course) => (

{course.title}

{course.progress}%
{course.completedLessons}/{course.totalLessons} lessons
{course.estimatedTimeLeft} left
))}
) }
